name: UITableViewDataSourcePrefetching
desc: A protocol that provides advance warning of the data requirements for a table view, allowing you to start potentially long-running data operations early.

items.name: func tableView(UITableView, prefetchRowsAt: [IndexPath])
items.desc: Instructs your prefetch data source object to begin preparing data for the cells at the supplied index paths.

items.name: func tableView(UITableView, cancelPrefetchingForRowsAt: [IndexPath])
items.desc: Cancels a previously triggered data prefetch request.
